title: Chris Van Hollen, Joe Crowley, Mexico Tariffs
itunes:title: Chris Van Hollen, Joe Crowley, Mexico Tariffs
description:
Guests include: Former Democratic New York Congressman Joe Crowley and Sery Kim, Republican Strategist and former Senior Advisor in the Trump Administration.

Kevin also talked to Senator Chris Van Hollen, a Democrat from Maryland about the letter he sent along with seven other senators asking the Federal Reserve to determine whether Deutsche Bank complied with anti-money-laundering laws.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
